Container.Name: TubeArchivist-Members
Container.Overview:
This is a client container for https://members.tubearchivist.com subscribers only.
This will keep a websocket connection open listening for notifications for new videos. Add your favorite channels to monitor on the subscriptions page. https://members.tubearchivist.com/subscriptions/

Config.Name: Member API Token
Config.Description: This is the access token you can find on your members profile page https://members.tubearchivist.com/profile/

Config.Name: TubeArchivist API Token
Config.Description: This is the access token for your Tube Archivist server, you can find that on the settings page.

Config.Name: TubeArchivist URL
Config.Description: Define the URL where your Tube Archivist instance is reachable, add protocol and port number if needed.

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: Defaults to UTC, optionally configure your timezone to adjust log output timestamps.

Config.Name: Autostart
Config.Description: Automatically prioritize and start videos sent from this service, requires Tube Archivist v0.3.6+ for API compatibility. Set to anything, except empty string
